meanings.definition: In a way that relates to the visual aspects of a scene or landscape.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted the landscape scenically, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent2: The mountains were scenically beautiful, with their snow-capped peaks.
meanings.sent3: The movie set was scenically stunning, almost like a dream come true.
meanings.sent4: Her mind wandered scenically, exploring the vast landscapes of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky scenically, with hues of orange and pink blending together.

meanings.definition: In a visually pleasing or picturesque manner.
meanings.sent1: The garden was scenically arranged, with flowers of every color.
meanings.sent2: The coastal town was scenically located, overlooking the sparkling ocean.
meanings.sent3: The cake was scenically decorated, like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed scenically as she danced under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The old castle stood scenically on top of the hill, a sight to behold for all who passed by.
